prerequisite.name: Checking xTuple Edition
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a Distribution database.

prerequisite.name: Checking for too-old xTuple ERP database version
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied to a 4.4+ Distribution database.

prerequisite.name: Checking for too-new xTuple ERP database version
prerequisite.message: This package may not be applied to a database newer than 4.9.0.

prerequisite.name: Checking if plv8 extension is installed
prerequisite.query: SELECT exists(SELECT 1 FROM pg_catalog.pg_extension WHERE extname = ‘plv8’);`
prerequisite.message: The PostgreSQL extention, plv8, must be installed on your database. See: https://github.com/xtuple/xtuple/wiki/Installing-PLv8

prerequisite.name: Checking for plv8 setup in postgresql.conf
prerequisite.message: Please add the line "plv8.start_proc = 'xt.js_init'" to your postgresql.conf and restart the database server.

prerequisite.name: Checking for mobile-enabled schemas
prerequisite.query: SELECT NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'xm');
prerequisite.message: This package may not be applied to a mobile-enabled database. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.

prerequisite.name: Checking for xwd schema
prerequisite.query: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'xwd');
prerequisite.message: This package requires that XWD 240 package to be installed before continuing.

prerequisite.name: Checking for duplicate Credit Card payments on Sales Orders
prerequisite.query: WITH counter AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS freq FROM payco GROUP BY payco_ccpay_id, payco_cohead_id ORDER BY 1) SELECT (COALESCE(MAX(freq), 1) = 0 OR COALESCE(MAX(freq), 1) = 1) FROM counter;
prerequisite.message: There are duplicate payco_ccpay_id and payco_cohead_id on the payco table. Please see your system administrator or contact xTuple.

prerequisite.name: Checking xwd Package Version
prerequisite.query: SELECT TRUE FROM pkghead WHERE pkghead_name = 'xwd' AND (pkghead_version >= '2.4');
prerequisite.message: This package must be applied against the 2.4.0 version of the xwd package.
